meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one billionth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: An abohm is a very small unit of resistance.
meanings.sent2: The circuit required only one abohm of resistance to function properly.
meanings.sent3: The tiny abohm resistance made the electronic device act like a stubborn child.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an abohm of resistance against the challenges she faced.
meanings.sent5: The abohm of resistance in the wire was barely noticeable but crucial for the experiment.
